cn.sharesdk.framework

类 Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.framework.Platform
  • 直接已知子类:
    CustomPlatform

    public abstract class Platform
extends java.lang.Object
    Platform template of ShareSDK.

    Platform only provides framework-level interfaces, the specific implementation of the interface implemented by subclasses for different platforms. Before calling any operation ShareSDK, be sure to initialize ShareSDK by calling the method ShareSDK.initSDK(Context).

    Generally, the best way to access the list of platforms registered in ShareSDK is calling the method ShareSDK.getPlatformList(Context), the use these platforms to finish your operations. However, if you don't need to display all platforms, you can also directly approach the right platform by calling ShareSDK.getPlatform(Context, String).In fact, ShareSDK.getPlatform(Context, String) will determine whether the platform is already cached in memory or not.If the list is not cached, this method will still call ShareSDK.getPlatformList(Context) to organize a list of platforms, then returns the requesting platform.

    Most of the operations in ShareSDK (UI thread) are carried the child thread, so these methods(such as share(ShareParams)) can be called directly in the UI thread. All these methods do not have a return value, if you need to return value, you have to call setPlatformActionListener(PlatformActionListener) before the operation. Then the result of the operation will be obtained to PlatformActionListener.

    ShareSDK offers three ways to set dev-info: registering informations in assets/ShareSDK.xml, calling ShareSDK#setPlatformDevInfo(String, HashMap) method to setting informations, or adding informations in ShareSDK dev-console of your app.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Platform.ShareParams
      a list of param to share ShareParams is used in method share(ShareParams), each platform has its ShareParams, most of time ShareParams are different between platforms.

      • customerProtocol

        public void customerProtocol(java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String method,
                    short customerAction,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> values,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filePathes)
        custom action interface

        developers can use this method to request more interface of the platform which ShareSDK do not provide.

        参数:
        url - url for the api of the platform
        method - HTTP method, "GET" or "POST"
        customerAction - custom action code, defined by developers
        values - requesting params for the api
        filePathes - contains files to send to the platform

      • getDb

        returns authorization database
